definition[0]: if a company, industry, or economy globalizes or is globalized, it has business activities all over the world
definition[1]: if a company, industry, or economy globalizes or is globalized, it no longer depends on conditions in one country, but on conditions all over the world
example[0]: Corporate alliances have globalized the aerospace industry.
example[1]: Most African companies are seeking to globalise, liberalising trade and opening the door to foreign investment.
